dil ki awaaz hai

ho chuke ham, tumhari mohabbat me gum

title: O Hansani
lyrics:
o hansani meri hansani, kaha ud chali
mere armano ke pankh laga ke, kaha ud chali
o hansani meri hansani, kaha ud chali
mere armano ke pankh laga ke, kaha ud chali

aaja meri saanso mai mahak raha re tera gajra
o aaja meri raato mai lahak raha re tera kajra

o aaja meri raato mai lahak raha re tera kajra

mere armano ke pankh laga ke, kaha ud chali

der se laharo mai kamal sambhaale huye man ka
jivan taal mai bhatak raha re tera hansa

jivan taal mai bhatak raha re tera hansa
